title: Huawei P50 Pro Review: A flagship to be proud of
content:
Many years ago, Huawei was a king amongst smartphone OEMs in both China and in Europe. With fantastic devices packed with premium hardware and a decent software experience, the company’s phones were, to some, the pinnacle of what Android could be. Rocked by sanctions imposed by the US government, the company has struggled to find

The post Huawei P50 Pro Review: A flagship to be proud of appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Huawei P50 Pro is the latest flagship smartphone from Huawei, and in our review, we explain why it's a flagship to be proud of.
